official_title: Resolution commending the city of Arcadia, Calif., for its participation in the Sister City Program and its twinning with Newcastle, New South Wales, Australia on September 30, 1975.

summary.text: Commends the city of Arcadia, California, for its participation in the sister city program and its twinning with Newcastle, New South Wales, Australia, on September 30, 1975.

titles.title: Resolution commending the city of Arcadia, Calif., for its participation in the Sister City Program and its twinning with Newcastle, New South Wales, Australia on September 30, 1975.
